name: Waiting for Godot (Asklios, NightfallJK, nayrutes, TobiasFunke)
name_original: Waiting for Godot (Asklios, NightfallJK, nayrutes, TobiasFunke)
description: Basically, we can just tell you that you are waiting for Godot in this cozy waiting room we build just for you using Godot. While we have already found our purpose in life you might just wait for yours or find it on your way. Have a great wait. For security reasons of all participating players all ropes have been removed.
